I like playing games online.
I am a vegetarian.
I will study computer science.
I am on my way to uc santa cruz where i was accepted.

participant_2.background:
We live in a rural area.
I am a woman.
My parents are still married.
I have several children.

content.text: Hi there! I'm going to be studying computer science at UC Santa Cruz.
Oh, that's cool! I grew up in a rural area and I've always been interested in computers.
That's great! What are some of your favorite games?
I really like playing online games with my friends.
I used to play a lot of online games too. I'm not as much into them anymore, but I still enjoy them from time to time.
Yeah, I know what you mean. I still play them sometimes, but not as much as I used to.
So, what do you do for fun?
I like to go hiking and camping with my kids. We live in a rural area, so there are a lot of great places to explore.
That sounds like fun! I love hiking and camping. I used to go hiking a lot when I lived in a rural area.
Yeah, it's a great way to get outside and enjoy nature.
So, what do you like about computer science?
I like the problem-solving aspect of it. I also like the fact that it's a growing field with a lot of opportunities.
Yeah, I agree. It's a great field to study. I'm excited to start my studies at UC Santa Cruz.
I'm sure you'll do great! You seem like you're really passionate about it.
